title: Floor Tile, 14th century
medium: Red earthenware, inlaid with pipe clay
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Square tile of red clay, stamped and inlaid with pipe clay in shape of double-headed.  Right edge missing. Four circular pits on back.

tombstone.epitaph:
Floor Tile, 14th century.
14th century. Red earthenware, inlaid with pipe clay. Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1955-144-1.
